validation.name: {{.Field}} must be a valid name.
validation.date: Invalid date values. Use this format (2006-01-01 15:04:05)
validation.lesser: Values submitted is lesser than the number required. {{.Min}}
validation.greater: Values submitted is greater than the number required. {{.Max}}
validation.special_char: {{.Field}} must be a Special Char e.g &#%.
validation.enum: {{.Field}} must contain one of the valid values: {{.Values}}..
validation.float: {{.Field}} must be a floating point number.
